review: ***DSL Internet Customers Beware!****If you are so unfortunate as to live in an area where DSL service is your internet option, this product will be of no use to you.With the first use, the movie paused several times in the first few minutes and then displayed a screen letting me know that my internet connection is too slow to run the movie without interruptions.The required minimum Mbps speed should be clearly stated in the product description.
